subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. quarterback Brett Favre is the offensive coordinator for the Oak Grove Warriors in Hattiesburg, Miss. The team is 7-2 and averaging more than 30 points a game.
snippet: The former N.F.L. quarterback Brett Favre is the offensive coordinator for the Oak Grove Warriors in Hattiesburg, Miss. The team is 7-2 and averaging more than 30 points a game.
